message: Let's split it fairly. I'll take 60% and you get 40%. What do you think?
I think we can do better than that.  Let's split it 55/45, with me getting the bigger share this time. It's a good start and will give us both more money than your offer.
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to get at least 5500. It's fair considering the inflation.  Let's reach an agreement and split the money.
